PCFG - Trans.from sentence:
PCFG - Trans
The rule - based system 1 modified on the code released by .

s 2 s+ att.from sentence:
s 2 s+ att
We implement a seq2seq with attention as the baseline method .

NQG.from sentence:
NQG
We extend the s 2s+ att with our feature - rich encoder to build the NQG system .

NQG +.from sentence: NQG + Based on NQG , we incorporate copy mechanism to deal with rare words problem .

NQG + Pretrain.from sentence: NQG + Pretrain Based on NQG + , we initialize the word embedding matrix with pre-trained GloVe vectors .

NQG + STshare.from sentence: NQG + STshare Based on NQG + , we make the encoder and decoder share the same embedding matrix .

NQG ++.from sentence:
NQG ++
Based on NQG + , we use both pre-train word embedding and STshare methods , to further improve the performance .
